IMPORTANT: PR title must follow Conventional Commits format:
Examples: "feat: add new rule", "fix: resolve import issue", "docs: update README"

## Description

<!-- Describe what this PR does and why -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Related Issues

<!-- Link any related issues: Closes #123, Fixes #456 -->

## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows Conventional Commits format (validated by CI)
- [ ] Code follows the style guidelines (`dart format .`)
- [ ] No analyzer warnings or errors (`dart analyze --fatal-infos`)
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`dart test`)
- [ ] Added tests for new features or bug fixes
- [ ] Updated documentation (README.md, CHANGELOG.md)
- [ ] Tested both `feature_xxx/` and `features/xxx/` naming conventions (if applicable)
- [ ] Self-review completed
